scripts.compile: npm run clean-dist && npm run compile-index
scripts.compile-index: node-sass --output dist --source-map true --source-map-contents true --output-style expanded src/css/index.scss
scripts.compile-dev-index: node-sass --output examples/css --source-map true --source-map-contents true --output-style expanded src/css/index.scss
scripts.start: npm run clean-dev && npm run compile-dev-index && npm run watch
scripts.sources: npm run clean-sources && npm run compile-sources
